item.title: Book Review: High Output Management
item.author: Xing Lin
item.description: I finished reading Andrew Grove’s book on ``High Output Management’’ and really liked it, especially when reading the second half. It explains a few concepts, such as how a person’s needs may change and what is controlling a person’s behavior. It also contains quite a few practical advices on how to handle issues that could happen in a workplace. I highly recommend everyone to take a look at this book.
